website_summaries.verdict: Bold reflective striping and loads of convenient features make this a great choice whether you're on duty or just out on the road. And it comes in big and tall sizes.
pros: Windproof and waterproof jacket with two-inch 3M Scotchlite reflective stripes across front, back, and arms
Side-seam zippers let you access pockets or belt
cons: Lime green color is more of a yellow

customer_reviews.title: Overall, a good jacket.
customer_reviews.text: Yes the pockets are too small to be of any practical use, but in ever other respect, this is a good jacket. I bought it for the absolutely frigid winters in Southern California (I walk to work at about midnight) and the jacket keeps me toasty and visible. Haven't had any rain yet to test that function, but the material shouldn't have any problem handling the about monsoon type downpours we get here every other day. Honestly though, happy with the jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Discworldfan

customer_reviews.title: DESIGN, CONSTRUCTION, MATERIALS TOP QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well designed and constructed. Quality materials. Has zippered inside security pocket where it will not interfere with movement. Has zippered side vents to allow comfortable sitting position on equipment or even on a horse. Very comfortable, warm and waterproof. Bought for family member and he loves it-especially the stand up collar lined with the same soft fleece that lines the body of the jacket. Worth more than the price.

Wouldn't say the jacket is the most stylish, but purchased for utility workware. Time will tell how it holds up, but is definitely better quality than others I looked at👍👍👍👍

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS ALL WEATHER JACKET
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 1 size larger with the intention of layering it up with shirt & hoodie. FITS PERFECTLY. I'm 5'6"and normally wear a medium, the large is perfect for a couple of extra layers plush NOT too big when worn alone. EXCELLENT construction; very durable and completely weather-proof. I've worn it in single-digit temps with a hoodie and have been toasty; I've worn it single layer in 45 degree damp/rainy weather and have been equally happy. Highly reflective for visibility, knit cuffs keep wind out. As other reviewers have said, the only thing lacking is a HOOD. I have requested this feature to the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer, Sharpsburg GA

customer_reviews.title: 4.5 Stars!!!

We ordered the X-Large so it could be worn over long-sleeved shirts and sweatshirts when it gets really cold. It is a perfect fit in the chest, across the shoulders, and the abdomen. The reason there is not 5 stars is that we had hoped the sleeves and length would have been about an inch longer. If there were only a tall size. With that said, highly recommend this and actually purchased another for a co-worker.

product_meta.title: Charles River Apparel Men's Signal Hi-Vis Waterproof Jacket (Regular & Big-Tall Sizes)
product_meta.description: Charles river apparel's hi-vis waterproof jacket is constructed to be rugged and durable. Made from oxford polyester with a 2000 mm waterproof coating and taped seams to seal out wind and rain. Anti-pill black fleece lining provides warmth and hides the signs of every day wear. Rib knit cuffs and hem seal out the cold. Convenient features include zippered side pockets and an inner valuables pocket. A sew-on badge holder is also included for work uniform purposes. When looking for quality apparel, look to Charles river apparel. Charles river apparel infuses their clothing with technology, performance, and contemporary style. Traditional new England value brings innovation to everything they make: innovation in how it fits, to the way it feels. Charles river apparel offers function that performs and fashion that lasts. After more than 30 years of leading quality, the family-owned business pushes into the future with their eyes on the horizon of innovation. Look good. Feel good. Charles river apparel.
feature_bullets: Wind and waterproof heavyweight oxford polyester, anti-pill black fleece lining
Two inch high 3m scotch lite reflective material on front, back and arms
Safety approved anise 107-2010 class iii rated colors (lime green and lime green/black colors only)
Side-seam zippers allow for ventilation and access to your duty belt or pockets
Front shoulder loops for radio attachment
